meanings.sent1: She beavered all day to finish her project on time.
meanings.sent2: The ants beavered away, building their intricate tunnels.
meanings.sent3: The beavered student finally completed the challenging assignment.
meanings.sent4: He beavered through the obstacles to reach his goal.
meanings.sent5: The team beavered together to achieve success in the competition.

meanings.sent1: After the long hike, she was completely beavered.
meanings.sent2: He beavered after working overtime for several days.
meanings.sent3: The beavered athlete collapsed at the finish line.
meanings.sent4: She felt beavered, as if she had run a marathon.
meanings.sent5: The tired workers beavered through the night to meet the deadline.

meanings.definition: Covered or adorned with beaver fur.
meanings.sent1: The beavered hat kept her head warm in the winter.
meanings.sent2: He wore a beavered coat to stay cozy in the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: The beavered gloves were soft and luxurious.
meanings.sent4: She admired the beavered trim on the elegant jacket.
meanings.sent5: The beavered collar added a touch of sophistication to the outfit.
